title: ‘Luck Has Not Been on Our Side:’ Van Aert’s Vuelta a España Ends in Heartbreak After Crashing Out
content:
'It's very sad': Van Aert abandons the Vuelta after winning three stages and leading both the green points jersey and King of the Mountains competition.

Read the full article at ‘Luck Has Not Been on Our Side:’ Van Aert’s Vuelta a España Ends in Heartbreak After Crashing Out on Velo.
author: ahood
